_sText:
Here, took me 2 weeks to make this one, I decided to make it when I saw Equilibrium, damn good movie so, here.

The terros start in the building, and the cts in front, the terros can go to the windows to shoot the cts, the cts can cover with the cars or rush to avoid the terros, or they can shoot back.

There are different strategics ways to go in, by the back, the stairs, the middle, ect...

This is a kinda special map because it is a de map, and a cs map.

The bomb site and hostage room is the same, so both team will want to rush to this room, wich
is closed.The only way to open the door is by a button in the middle zone, wich is the most dangerous.

Once it is opened, you can close it back from inside the room, or by pressing again the middle button.

Try to blow the bomb once ;)

===========Credits============
